org.lainsoft.forge.flow.nav

Class GenericCommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lainsoft.forge.flow.nav.GenericCommandFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandFactory

    public class GenericCommandFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandFactory
    Generic implementation of a command factory, it coverts the path of a stimulus into a cannonical class name to be load.
